MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「どうしたら来ヶ谷さんのようにカッコよくなれますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Can you tell me how to be cool like you, Kurugaya-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Can you tell me how to be cool like you, Kurugaya-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: こっそり聞きに行くと、クドが来ヶ谷さんにそんな質問をしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I stealthily walked up to them, I heard Kud ask Kurugaya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I stealthily walked up to them, I heard Kud ask Kurugaya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「はあ…カッコよく、とな」
`クド@「はいっ、私はカッコよくなりたいのですっ」
`クド@「成長促進のために毎日牛乳を欠かしたことはありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I never miss a day drinking my milk to get bigger.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I never miss a day drinking my milk to get bigger.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「にも関わらず全く成果が出ないのです…せめて性格だけでもカッコよくなりたいです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝In spite of this, I get no results at all... So I at least want to have a cool personality instead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝In spite of this, I get no results at all... So I at least want to have a cool personality instead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なるほど、キミの思いはよくわかった」
`クド@「はい、できれば外国っぽいのがさらによろしいかと思いますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, if possible I'd like to be kinda foreign.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, if possible I'd like to be kinda foreign.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、では今後は語頭に『ガッデム』語尾に『あたいに触ると痺れるぜ』とつけるといい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, then use ❛goddamn❜ at the beginning of a sentence and ❛touch me and you'll lose that hand❜ at the end.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, then use ❛goddamn❜ at the beginning of a sentence and ❛touch me and you'll lose that hand❜ at the end.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わかりましたっ」
`理樹@「わかっちゃうんだっ!?」
と、そこに小毬さんがてくてくと歩いてくる。
`来ヶ谷@「よし、挨拶にいってくるといい」
`クド@「はいっ」
クドが小毬さんのところへ向かう。
`理樹@「あんまりムチャクチャ言わないようにね」
`来ヶ谷@「ふむ、まあカッコよさなど他人に教わるものではないということさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hmm, what I wanted to teach her is that how to be cool isn't something that can be taught by someone else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hmm, what I wanted to teach her is that how to be cool isn't something that can be taught by someone else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも楽しんでるでしょ」
`来ヶ谷@「無論楽しいがなにか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Of course I am. What about it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Of course I am. What about it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …本当にこの人に相談なんかしていいんだろうか。変なところで子供っぽい、というか…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I don't really know if I should ask her for advice when I get in trouble. She can be really childish at times...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I don't really know if I should ask her for advice when I get in trouble. She can be really childish at times...

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「『俺のクドに何てこと言いやがるファッキン叩き潰すぞメーン』と考えているな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You're thinking, ❛What the fuck have you done to my Kud? I'm gonna fucking kick your fucking ass, man,❜ right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You're thinking, ❛What the fuck have you done to my Kud? I'm gonna fucking kick your fucking ass, man,❜ right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、考えてないから…僕のでもないし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I'm not... And she's not mine...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I'm not... And she's not mine...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …この人の言動はいつもムチャクチャなのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...On a second thought, maybe she's always this extreme.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...On a second thought, maybe she's always this extreme.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、私は知者賢者でもキーパーソンでもない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You know, I'm not a sophist, sage or even a key person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You know, I'm not a sophist, sage or even a key person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…行雲流水、在るがままに僅かな示唆を残すのみだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Drifting with the tide. I just live as I am.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Drifting with the tide. I just live as I am.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん、僕にはよくわからないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm, not really sure what you're talking about...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm, not really sure what you're talking about...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「はっはっは。まあ小毬君でもゆるりと観察しようじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hah-hah-hah. Anyway, let's see what'll happen to Komari-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hah-hah-hah. Anyway, let's see what'll happen to Komari-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…来ヶ谷さん」
`来ヶ谷@「ん」
`西園@「わたしは『ガッデム』より『ノッテンガム』のほうが美しいと思います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝In my opinion, Nottingham sounds more beautiful than goddamn.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝In my opinion, Nottingham sounds more beautiful than goddamn.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「いや…キミが何を思っているのか想像が付かん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Er... I can't figure out what you are imagining.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Er... I can't figure out what you are imagining.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そうですか…では」
元の木陰へ戻って行く。
MESSAGE.EN: She returned to the shade of the tree.
MESSAGE.Translation: She returned to the shade of the tree.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「くッ、なんなんだこの敗北感は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Damn, what's with this feeling of defeat...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Damn, what's with this feeling of defeat...❞

MESSAGE.JP: いや別に何の勝敗も付いてないと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't think there's a winner or loser here.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't think there's a winner or loser here.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「よおーし今日もいっしょーけんめーがんばるよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝All right! I'm gonna practice hard as always!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝All right! I'm gonna practice hard as always!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんがいつもの調子でグラウンドに向かう。
`小毬@「クーちゃん、私がんばるよー」
`クド@「ガッデムがんばってあたいに触ると痺れるぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Goddamn, I'll also do my best, touch me and you'll lose that hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Goddamn, I'll also do my best, touch me and you'll lose that hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃ、じゃあ一緒にキャッチボールしようかー」
`クド@「ガッデム今は無理ですあたいに触ると痺れるぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Goddamn, I can't do that now, touch me and you'll lose that hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Goddamn, I can't do that now, touch me and you'll lose that hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うああああんっ!!　クーちゃんが怖いぃーーーっ!!」
小毬さん、泣きながら逃走。
`来ヶ谷@「ああ、可愛い…」
…そして来ヶ谷さんが萌えていた。
`クド@「ガッデム！　逃げられてしまいましたあたいに触ると痺れるぜ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Goddamn! She's gone, touch me and you'll lose that hand!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Goddamn! She's gone, touch me and you'll lose that hand!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そりゃあ小毬さんにそんなこと言ったら逃げるだろうね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You shouldn't have told her something like that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You shouldn't have told her something like that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ガッデム！　来ヶ谷さん全然ダメですあたいに触ると痺れるぜ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Goddamn! Kurugaya-san, it didn't work, touch me and you'll lose that hand!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Goddamn! Kurugaya-san, it didn't work, touch me and you'll lose that hand!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なんだと？」
`クド@「わふーっ！　ケンカ売りまくりだと今気付きましたー!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu! I just realized, aren't I picking a fight!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu! I just realized, aren't I picking a fight!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: もっと早く気付くべきだったと思う。
`鈴@「ガッデムあたいに触ると痺れるぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Goddamn, touch me and you'll lose that hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Goddamn, touch me and you'll lose that hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「えええぇーーーーーっ!?」
あ、鈴に感染ってる…。
`西園@「…来ヶ谷さん」
`来ヶ谷@「ん、なんだ」
また相談なのか、西園さんが来ヶ谷さんに話しかけていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san was talking to Kurugaya-san again. Was she asking for some advice?
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san was talking to Kurugaya-san again. Was she asking for some advice?

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「楽しいですか？」
`来ヶ谷@「…何がだ」
`西園@「いえ…来ヶ谷さんは悩みがなさそうだなと思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I just think you haven't a care in the world.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I just think you haven't a care in the world.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「キミは今、ものすごく失敬なことを言っているからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Do you realize that's a really rude remark you're making?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Do you realize that's a really rude remark you're making?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そ、そうですか。失礼しました」
`来ヶ谷@「まあいい、で、なんだ」
`西園@「はい、来ヶ谷さんはいつもなにか楽しそうにしていますから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You always seem to be enjoying your life.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You always seem to be enjoying your life.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…それがうらやましいです」
`西園@「どうしたらわたしもそんな風にいられるでしょう」
`来ヶ谷@「そうだな…」
`来ヶ谷@「そういうことなら、私などより小毬君を見習うといい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I guess I'm not the right person to ask. I suggest you ask Komari-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I guess I'm not the right person to ask. I suggest you ask Komari-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「神北さんを、ですか」
`来ヶ谷@「まずはトレースからだ。ちょうどいい、小毬君が来たぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Behave as she does. Good timing, here she comes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Behave as she does. Good timing, here she comes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「あたかも小毬君が分身して、一人$K55漫才$K0やってるかのようになってこい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Imagine that you're doing a one-man $K55comedy act$K0, and replicate all her moves.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Imagine that you're doing a one-man $K55comedy act$K0, and replicate all her moves.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わかりました」
`理樹@「何でみんなそこでわかるのさっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How can she say okay to that!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How can she say okay to that!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふんふんふーん～」
小毬さんが鼻歌を歌いながらグラウンドに現れる。
`西園@「…ふんふんふーん、と…」
なにやら木陰でノートに書き込みをしている西園さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san was writing in her notebook in the shade of the tree.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san was writing in her notebook in the shade of the tree.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「え、なにみおちゃん？」
`西園@「まずは研究です」
`小毬@「け、研究？」
`西園@「気になさらないでください」
`小毬@「う、うーん？」
`小毬@「よおーし今日もがんばるよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝All right, I'll make a big effort as always!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝All right, I'll make a big effort as always!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…よおーし今日もがんばるよー、と…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...All right, I'll make a big effort as always...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...All right, I'll make a big effort as always...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「な、なにしてるのみおちゃん？」
`西園@「いえ、ただ神北さんを真似るため観察しているだけです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm just observing you to better mimic you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm just observing you to better mimic you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふ、ふええ？」
`西園@「…じーっ…」
`小毬@「うああああんっ、きになるーっ!!」
`西園@「ダメですか」
`小毬@「うえーん、ダメってことはないけど…」
`小毬@「れっつきゃちぼー！」
ボールを持ってぐるんぐるんと腕を振り回す小毬さん。
MESSAGE.EN: She was spinning her right arm around with a ball in hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was spinning her right arm around with a ball in hand.

MESSAGE.JP: …ゆらり、と怪しげな円運動を始める西園さん。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Slowly and fishily, Nishizono-san started waving her arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Slowly and fishily, Nishizono-san started waving her arms.

MESSAGE.JP: 挙動を真似し始めたらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like she's mimicking what Komari-san is doing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like she's mimicking what Komari-san is doing.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「気になさらないでください」
`小毬@「う、うん…」
`小毬@「じゃ、じゃあいくよー」
`クド@「はいーっ」
`西園@「…おんどりゃあ」
ゆらり、と太極拳のような動きをしながら、ぼそ、といつもの小毬さんの台詞を真似る。
MESSAGE.EN: Swaying around like she was practicing Tai Chi, she muttered an imitation of one of Komari-san's stock lines.
MESSAGE.Translation: Swaying around like she was practicing Tai Chi, she muttered an imitation of one of Komari-san's stock lines.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「う、うあああああんっ!!　私そんなんじゃないーーーーーっ!!!」
…小毬さん、泣きながら逃走。
`クド@「ああっ、小毬さーんっ!!」
`理樹@「二人まとめてからかって楽しんでるよね、来ヶ谷さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, you're just using them for your own amusement, aren't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, you're just using them for your own amusement, aren't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ」
`理樹@「うむ、じゃなくてさ…」
西園さんが戻ってくる。
`西園@「失敗した模様です」
`来ヶ谷@「そのようだな」
`来ヶ谷@「じゃあ次は…そうだな、そろそろ真人少年が来るか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Let me see what's next... Okay, I guess young man Masato will get here sometime soon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Let me see what's next... Okay, I guess young man Masato will get here sometime soon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「何を言われても『アチシみおっち、おまえゲロ犬』と答えるといい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Whatever he says, you reply ❛I am Miocchi, you are a puke dog.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Whatever he says, you reply ❛I am Miocchi, you are a puke dog.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「全然関係ないじゃんっ!?」
`西園@「わかりました」
`理樹@「いやだからなんでそこでわかっちゃうのさっ!!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How the heck can you accept that suggestion!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How the heck can you accept that suggestion!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おうマネージャー、早速喉がかわいたぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey manager, I want something to drink.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey manager, I want something to drink.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「アチシみおっち、おまえゲロ犬」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I am Miocchi, you are a puke dog.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I am Miocchi, you are a puke dog.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あ、いや…言い方が悪かったな。わりいけど麦茶持ってきてもらえねえか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Er, well... Maybe I worded it wrong. Sorry, but can you bring me some barley tea?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Er, well... Maybe I worded it wrong. Sorry, but can you bring me some barley tea?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「アチシみおっち、おまえゲロ犬」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I am Miocchi, you are a puke dog.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I am Miocchi, you are a puke dog.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うぉおおぉーーーっ!!　何でオレいきなりゲロ犬扱いされてんだぁあぁーーーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uoooooo!! Why is she suddenly treating me as a puke doooooog!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uoooooo!! Why is she suddenly treating me as a puke doooooog!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「いやいや、実に面白い」
`理樹@「いやまあ…」
`来ヶ谷@「まあ、『楽しく』なんて堅苦しく考えてはな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝To begin with, you shouldn't purposely look for the answer to how to live happily.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝To begin with, you shouldn't purposely look for the answer to how to live happily.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「その時点でその目的を達成することは難しいだろう、ということさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Once you decide to do that, it only makes it harder to achieve. That's what I wanted to convey to her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Once you decide to do that, it only makes it harder to achieve. That's what I wanted to convey to her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それを伝える手段がむちゃくちゃすぎだからさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You should find a more appropriate way if you really want to tell her that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You should find a more appropriate way if you really want to tell her that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえずなんか悩みがあっても、この人に相談するのは止めよう、と思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I resolved not to ask her for advice even if I get in trouble.
MESSAGE.Translation: I resolved not to ask her for advice even if I get in trouble.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「アチシりんっち、おまえゲロ犬」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I am Rincchi, you are a puke dog.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I am Rincchi, you are a puke dog.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ええええーーーーーーーっっ!?」
あ、また鈴に感染ってる…。
`葉留佳@「姉御ー、ちょっといい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Anego, can I have a word with you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Anego, can I have a word with you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「む、なんだね葉留佳君」
`葉留佳@「姉御はさ、胸おっきいよね」
`来ヶ谷@「うむ、大きいがなにか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yes. Is there a problem with them being big?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yes. Is there a problem with them being big?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いやー、夏も間近ですしね」
`葉留佳@「もうちょっとスタイルよくなるにゃ、どうしたらいいかと思ったんですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So I'm wondering how to get a nice body.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So I'm wondering how to get a nice body.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「なんて贅沢な悩みですかっ！　悩むのは私くらいになってからにしなさいっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What nerve you have! Why don't you try having a body like mine before worrying about something like that!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What nerve you have! Why don't you try having a body like mine before worrying about something like that!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「全くぷんぷんですっ!!　そこに直りなさいっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I am so indignant!! Sit down right there!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I am so indignant!! Sit down right there!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …なんでひとりでキレてるんだろう…。
`葉留佳@「まあひんぬーワンコは放っておいてさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, let's leave the boobless doggy aside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, let's leave the boobless doggy aside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ガーンっ！　至極直接的に言われてしまいましたっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Gahhn! Hitting me directly with the truth!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Gahhn! Hitting me directly with the truth!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「胸限定でいいのか？」
`葉留佳@「うんまあ、とりあえずお願いしますヨ」
`来ヶ谷@「そうだな…」
`来ヶ谷@「揉んでもらえ」
`葉留佳@「えええーーー」
`葉留佳@「だ、誰に」
`来ヶ谷@「そりゃあまあ、好きな人に揉んでもらったほうがいいんじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, wouldn't it be best if it was somebody you like?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, wouldn't it be best if it was somebody you like?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ちなみに私は収まり効かなくなりそうだからやらん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝By the way, I might be unable to hold myself back so I'll have to decline...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝By the way, I might be unable to hold myself back so I'll have to decline...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんの収まりなのさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What do you mean, hold yourself back...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What do you mean, hold yourself back...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ああっ、理樹くんちょっとこういうの聞くのマナー違反っ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey, Riki-kun, you don't ask that sort of question!! That's a breach of manners!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey, Riki-kun, you don't ask that sort of question!! That's a breach of manners!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんがいきなり僕の目の前で話し始めたんじゃないかっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're the one who started this conversation right in front of me!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're the one who started this conversation right in front of me!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんのエロっ!!　エロスっ!!　エロの化身っ!!　エロ山大将っ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, you are ero! An eros!! An avatar of ero!! The general of the Ero Mountain!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, you are ero! An eros!! An avatar of ero!! The general of the Ero Mountain!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「待ってよ何でそこまでエロエロ連呼されないといけないのさっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hold on, why do I have to be called ero that many times!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hold on, why do I have to be called ero that many times!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: すっ。
`葉留佳@「ひゃうっ!?」
葉留佳さんの両脇から手が伸びてきて、ぺったりと胸を触る。
MESSAGE.EN: Somebody's hands reached out from under Haruka-san's arms, and touched her breasts.
MESSAGE.Translation: Somebody's hands reached out from under Haruka-san's arms, and touched her breasts.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「失礼しました。…では」
去っていく。
`理樹@「な、何がしたかったんだろう…」
`来ヶ谷@「おっぱいが揉みたかったんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝She must've wanted to massage her boobs.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝She must've wanted to massage her boobs.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんな来ヶ谷さんみたいな人じゃないからね、西園さんは」
西園さんなりの親切なんだろうか…。
`来ヶ谷@「まあ、生まれ持ったものを今更どうこうすることは出来ん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, that's something that's already decided at birth, so there's not much you can do about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, that's something that's already decided at birth, so there's not much you can do about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…最大限努力してみること、それが大切なのではないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Do everything you can, that may be what matters the most.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Do everything you can, that may be what matters the most.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうですねっ、おっぱい小さいことぐらい努力で何とかなると思いますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That's true. If you want your breasts to grow, all you have to do is to make an effort and it'll work out somehow!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's true. If you want your breasts to grow, all you have to do is to make an effort and it'll work out somehow!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「クド公は相当努力必要みたいだけどねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝In your case I suppose it'll take quite some effort, Little Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝In your case I suppose it'll take quite some effort, Little Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ガーン!?」
`来ヶ谷@「なに、クドリャフカ君はそのままで十二分に可愛いだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What, you are plenty cute as you are, Kudryavka-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What, you are plenty cute as you are, Kudryavka-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…来ヶ谷さん、目が怪しいよ」
…まあ、そんなこんなで、正直男の僕にはよくわからない内容だった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Well, being a man, I honestly didn't really understand what they were talking about.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Well, being a man, I honestly didn't really understand what they were talking about.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「るんのるんのるん～」
`小毬@「ふ、ふえ？」
`小毬@「ひゃあああああーーーっ!?　なななにーーーっ!?」
能天気に登場した小毬さんに、鈴がいきなり脇をくすぐりにかかったようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san, who had showed up in an upbeat mood, suddenly got titillated by Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san, who had showed up in an upbeat mood, suddenly got titillated by Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんか今度は間違った影響受けてるし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She got the wrong kind of influence again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She got the wrong kind of influence again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…相談する内容を相談したい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...You want to know what you should ask me for advice on?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...You want to know what you should ask me for advice on?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちりん、と音を立てて鈴が頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded with her bell chiming.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded with her bell chiming.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「これはまた妙な相談だな」
`鈴@「何を相談したらいい」
`来ヶ谷@「そういうものは相談をする前に決めておくものだがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You're basically supposed to decide it before you ask.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You're basically supposed to decide it before you ask.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「いや、ある意味正しいことなのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝No, wait, in a way it could be the right thing to do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝No, wait, in a way it could be the right thing to do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なるほど。鈴君の相談は哲学的命題だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Interesting. Your question is a philosophical proposition.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Interesting. Your question is a philosophical proposition.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 首をかしげる。
`理樹@（まあ、要はみんなが来ヶ谷さんに相談持ちかけてたから、自分もやってみたかっただけなんだろうなぁ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Well, I suspect the reason Rin's asking Kurugaya-san is just because everybody else has done so.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Well, I suspect the reason Rin's asking Kurugaya-san is just because everybody else has done so.)

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず見守ることにしよう。
`来ヶ谷@「ふむ…そうだな、相談の内容といえば交友関係についてが一般的なんじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hmm... In my opinion, a lot of people are worried about their relationships with others, so it's not a bad thing to ask about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hmm... In my opinion, a lot of people are worried about their relationships with others, so it's not a bad thing to ask about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こういう？」
`鈴@「それはどういう関係だ」
`来ヶ谷@「友達と仲良くしたい、とかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Like when you want to be more friendly with somebody.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Like when you want to be more friendly with somebody.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いい相談っぽいな」
満足げな笑顔に。
MESSAGE.EN: She had a satisfied smile on her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had a satisfied smile on her face.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ。おねーさんも頼られて嬉しいぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, this Onee-san is also glad to be relied on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, this Onee-san is also glad to be relied on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「じゃあ、それはどうすればいい？」
`来ヶ谷@「そうだな…」
`来ヶ谷@「とりあえず小毬君が『うん』という度に『こ』とすかさずつけてやるといい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝To begin with, add ❛-oop❜ every time Komari-kun says ❛p.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝To begin with, add ❛-oop❜ every time Komari-kun says ❛p.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「わかった」
`理樹@「だーかーらぁー!!　内容と全然関係ないじゃんっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait a minute!! That has nothing to do with her question!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait a minute!! That has nothing to do with her question!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ」
`理樹@「うむ、じゃないからっ！」
`理樹@「ていうか鈴、もう行っちゃったしっ!!」
`来ヶ谷@「はっはっは、私たちはそれをゆるりと眺めるとしようじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hah-hah-hah, let's take it easy and see what will happen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hah-hah-hah, let's take it easy and see what will happen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああもう…」
`理樹@「何でみんなむちゃくちゃ言われてんのに素直に頷くんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't understand why those girls follow your every suggestion without a second thought...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't understand why those girls follow your every suggestion without a second thought...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「『オレの鈴になんてこと言いやがるんだファッキンたたきつぶすぞヘッポコ野郎』と考えているな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You're thinking, ❛What the fuck have you done to my Rin? I'm gonna fucking kick your fucking ass,❜ right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You're thinking, ❛What the fuck have you done to my Rin? I'm gonna fucking kick your fucking ass,❜ right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「考えてないよっ!!　ていうか『オレの』ってなんだよっ!!」
`来ヶ谷@「そもそも、別に私は間違ったことを言っているつもりはないぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝From the first to the last, I don't think I've said anything wrong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝From the first to the last, I don't think I've said anything wrong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「手段はまあ、ギャグだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, I admit all the advice I gave them are gags, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, I admit all the advice I gave them are gags, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやその手段が致命的な問題なんだけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, it's a fatal problem all right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, it's a fatal problem all right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、そういうことを通じて交友を深めていけばいいじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, it wouldn't be a bad way to improve your friendship, don't you think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, it wouldn't be a bad way to improve your friendship, don't you think.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「私が与えているのは自分から話しかけろ、というきっかけに過ぎん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What I gave them are just opportunities to have conversations with other people.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What I gave them are just opportunities to have conversations with other people.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 確かにそれは正しいことだ。
`来ヶ谷@「さて、小毬君の反応が楽しみだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Now then, I'm looking forward to Komari-kun's reaction.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Now then, I'm looking forward to Komari-kun's reaction.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やっぱりそれだけが目的なんでしょ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝In the end, I suspect that is the only purpose you have...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝In the end, I suspect that is the only purpose you have...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ホントに、真面目にやってればすごい人なのになぁ、この人は。
MESSAGE.EN: She sure is a very capable woman when it comes to something like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sure is a very capable woman when it comes to something like this.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「らんらんらーん」
`小毬@「やっほっほー」
相変らず能天気に小毬さんが登場。
`小毬@「うん、き」
`小毬@「きょ、今日もいいお天気～」
`クド@「小毬さん、今日もキャッチボールですっ」
`小毬@「うんっ」
`クド@「小毬さんはどんどん上手くなるのに、なかなか私は上達しません…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝My baseball skill hasn't improved very much unlike yours, Komari-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝My baseball skill hasn't improved very much unlike yours, Komari-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「何かコツでもあるんでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Are there good ways to make it better?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Are there good ways to make it better?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？　こ、コツかぁ…うーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue? Good ways... I guess it's po...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue? Good ways... I guess it's po...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「う、うあああーーんっ!!　『こ』って言われてるだけなのになんかすっごいやだぁーーーーーっ!!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uwahhhhn!! Why does the ❛oop❜ give me such a horribly unpleasant feeling!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uwahhhhn!! Why does the ❛oop❜ give me such a horribly unpleasant feeling!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さん、泣きながら逃走。
`クド@「ああっ、小毬さーんっ!!」
`鈴@「…逃げられた」
`来ヶ谷@「うむ、だろうな」
`鈴@「だましたのか」
`来ヶ谷@「キミに足りないのは自分で判断する力だな」
`来ヶ谷@「…今回は失敗した。じゃあ次はどうすればいい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...You failed this time. Then what's the next thing you have to do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...You failed this time. Then what's the next thing you have to do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「もっとうまくやればいい。今度は自分でな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You should be able to do better by yourself next time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You should be able to do better by yourself next time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…難しいな」
`来ヶ谷@「うむ、難しいのだよ」
`来ヶ谷@「まあ、そういうわけなのさ」
はっはっは、と笑いながら来ヶ谷さんは去っていった。
`鈴@「…さっぱりわからん」
`理樹@「いやまあ」
わからない人なんだ、来ヶ谷さんってのは。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san certainly is a girl of mystery.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san certainly is a girl of mystery.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ゆいちゃんーっ」
`来ヶ谷@「いや、だからゆいちゃんと呼ぶのはやめろと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝No, won't you stop calling me Yui-chan already...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝No, won't you stop calling me Yui-chan already...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …今度は戻ってきた小毬さんが来ヶ谷さんに相談。
MESSAGE.EN: ...This time it was Komari-san asking Kurugaya-san for advice.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...This time it was Komari-san asking Kurugaya-san for advice.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「それで何かねコマリマックス」
`小毬@「なんかね…最近、変なんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝You know what... Something weird has kept going on around me lately.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝You know what... Something weird has kept going on around me lately.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ふむ、というと？」
`小毬@「練習前になるとね、みんながなんか変なこと言ったりしたりしてくるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Every time before I start practice, somebody else does or says something weird to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Every time before I start practice, somebody else does or says something weird to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「気のせいだ」
`小毬@「ええぇーーーっ!?」
`来ヶ谷@「うむ、以上」
`小毬@「そ、そっか…気のせいかぁ…」
…いや、元凶が目の前にいるんですけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...No, Komari-san, you have to realize that the villain is right before your eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...No, Komari-san, you have to realize that the villain is right before your eyes.
